message: Let's start fair. I'll take a bigger share, but I'm open to negotiation.
My turn. How about a slightly better split? This seems fairer.
Let's try to find a middle ground. I'm willing to give up some of my share, but I need more than 5500.
Time is running out! This offer is a good compromise. Don't let the money disappear.
I'm still willing to negotiate, but I need a bit more than your last offer. We're both losing money with each passing round.
This is getting ridiculous.  A 50/50 split is the only fair option. Take it or leave it.
